Text: Bangiya Gramin Vikash Bank (BGVB) is a premier Regional Rural Bank established in terms of provisions of Regional Rural Banks Act 1976 & is sponsored by United Bank of India.
Triplets:<Bangiya Gramin Vikash Bank
1:
--------------------
Text: Bangiya Gramin Vikash Bank:  BGVB has been established with the amalgamation of erstwhile Mallabhum Gramin Bank, Gaur Gramin Bank, Murshidabad Gramin Bank, Nadia Gramin Bank and Sagar Gramin Bank.
Triplets:<Bangiya Gramin Vikash Bank
